text: Beerus is a fictional god from Dragon Ball Super. He resembles a purple cat and is accompanied by his teacher Whis. Beerus is known as the God of Destruction. He earned the name after lots of training. He is very powerful but can also be lazy with a love for food. Beerus's design is based off of Dragon Ball creator Akira Toriyama's pet sphynx cat Debo. ==References== Category:Dragon Ball characters Category:Fictional cats Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2013
